Reviews.Title: ok tv
Reviews.Author: blue
Reviews.Content: Ive had this tv for about 2 years now. Dont get me wrong you get alot of tv for the price, but the only bad thing about this tv is the contrast ratio. Its only 1300:1 which is crap if you want a true hi def tv. On the other hand the sound quality is great. the internal speakers with the bass really make it like your in the movie. I have mine set up to a vizio 5.1 surround sound bar and couldnt be happier. I think this is a great starter tv for anyone looking for a deal. My xbox 360 games look great on it, but still the contrast ratio sucks. Ok tv.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't buy this HDTV 'cause it is old!!! You can buy a nice HDTV at this price.
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: Honestly, this is a good HDTV for $500. The quality is pretty nice and yes, like this guy said.. the contract ratio is bad. :\Still looks pretty to me!  Don't buy it at this price. :)

Reviews.Title: Last RCA I will buy...
Reviews.Author: M. Morris
Reviews.Content: This TV has the most annoying problem of having **NO CODES**! No remote will work... universal, digital box...NONE, only the one that comes with the TV! There also are too few ports. If I had paid anywhere near this price, I would be VERY sorry...
